participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is nurturing and enjoys the simple pleasures in life. She has a green thumb and loves spending time in nature.
participant_1.background: i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors. i've a dogs. i'm a woman. i work as a school teacher. i attend church every week.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: George is outgoing and has a flair for the dramatic, often finding joy in the extraordinary aspects of life.
participant_2.background: i married a super model from italy. my favorite food is papaya. i've zero family that i'm close to. i'm a bee farmer. my name is george.
